summary: Hyperscalers (Microsoft, Google, Meta) are aggressively increasing AI-focused Capex in 2024/2025, while AWS maintains high investment. H100/A100 rental prices remain elevated ($3.15/hr) due to sustained demand from new model deployments (GPT-4o, Llama 3) and anticipation of GPT-5/Gemini 2. Market conditions indicate robust growth and supply constraints.
